tool_description: An API showing all the latest Greek news  in English
name: Greek News in English
title: Greek News in English

api_list.name: Get All Sources
api_list.description: Get All Sources' names and ids
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://greek-news-in-english.p.rapidapi.com/api/sources"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "greek-news-in-english.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get Articles From A Single Source
api_list.description: Get Greek News from a specific news source.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://greek-news-in-english.p.rapidapi.com/api/news/ktg"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",

        }

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get All News
api_list.description: This endpoint will return back all greek news from all the sources.
